src:
Nevolja stigla u Pirej: Ksanti ostao bez šuta ka golu, ali Olimpijakosu pripala samo mrva
Kiks Zvezdinog rivala

02 Nov 2019

Bajern je doživeo debakl u Frankfurtu, ali i Olimpijakos je servirao navijačima neprijatno iznenađenje uoči utakmice na Alijanc Areni u okviru četvrtog kola Lige šampiona. Vicešampion Grčke remizirao je na gostovanju Škodi Ksanti (0:0) i ugrozio opstanak na liderskoj poziciji. Olimpijakos sada ima tri boda više u odnosu na PAOK, ali Solunjani sutra igraju protiv Panatinaikosa.
Trener tima iz Pireja Pedro Martins poslao je na teren vrlo jak tim, poređen u formaciju 4-3-3. Od prvog minuta su igrali Semedo, El Arabi, Podens, Buhalakis. Olimpijakos je imao incijativu tokom čitavog meča. Zanimljivo je da tim za koji je igrao nekadašnji vezista Crvene zvezde i Partizana Petar Đuričković nije imao šut ka golu Olimpijakosa. Ni pored gola.
Sa druge strane Olimpijakos jer pokušao 13 puta, peu udarca išla su u okvir Ksantijevog gola. Međutim, ništa nije vredelo, jer je blistao golman domaćina Karlos Abad. Morali su Pirejci da se pomire sa drugim prvenstvenim remijem.
text:
Trouble arrives in Piraeus: Xanthi was left without a shot towards goal, but Olympiacos only had a crumb
Kicks of the Star Rival

02 Nov 2019

Bayern suffered a debacle in Frankfurt, but Olympiakos also gave fans an unpleasant surprise ahead of a match at the Alliance Arena in the fourth round of the Champions League. The vice-champion of Greece drew on Skoda Xanthi's away game (0-0) and threatened to survive in the leadership position. Olympiakos now have three points more than PAOK, but the Thessalonians play tomorrow against the Panathinaikos.
Piraeus coach Pedro Martins sent a very strong team to the field, compared to a 4-3-3 formation. From the first minute they played Semedo, El Arabi, Podens, Buhalakis. Olympiacos had an initiative throughout the match. Interestingly, the team played by former Red Star and Partizan midfielder Petar Djurickovic had no shot at the Olympics goal. Not even naked.
Olympiacos on the other hand, because he tried 13 times, peu blows went into the frame of Xanthi's goal. However, nothing was worth it as the home team's keeper Carlos Abad shone through. The Piraeus had to come to terms with the other championship draw.
